page.title: 16Communications.
page.content: Post Offices. Middleham. Subpostmaster & 2 shop assistants.. Postal collections: 11am; 3pm; 5.15pm. Sorting offices at Leyburn & Darlington. Also a general store, selling food, stationery, toys & sweets. About 300 letters & parcels posted daily in Middleham. Most time consuming duties:_ paying pensions & allowances. Postmasters annual holiday 3 weeks. East Witton. Subpostmistress & 1 assistant. Opening hrs: Daily 9am._ 12.30; 1.30_ 5.30. Thursday & Friday 9am._ 1pm.;1.30_ 5:30: Saturday 9am_ 12.30. Sunday closed. Also a small shop. Nearest towns for family shop_ ping: Leyburn & Ripon. Changes in East Witton: more retired people; fewer buses; more private cars; fewer village activities; fewer people working on the farms.Schl closed 1977.
